% !TEX program = xelatex
\documentclass[a4paper,11pt,oneside]{book}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont{PT Serif}
\setmonofont{PT Mono}
%% if i18n.language == "en"
\usepackage[english]{babel}
%% elif i18n.language == "sk"
\usepackage[main=slovak,english]{babel}
%% elif i18n.language == "ru"
\usepackage[main=russian,english]{babel}
%% endif

\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{minted}    % for source code
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{amsmath}   % support LaTeX math
\usepackage{amssymb}   % additional symbols
\usepackage{csquotes}  % support quote block
\usepackage[unicode=true]{hyperref}  % support hyperlinks in pdf document
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{tcolorbox} % for our admonitions
\usepackage{xcolor}    % for admonition coloring

% Import document styles
\include{styles/it4kt}
%% if custom_style
\include{styles/custom}
%% endif


\begin{document}
  \tableofcontents
  \graphicspath{{}}
  \chapter{\VAR{i18n.t("theme:foreword")}}
%% for page in course.pages
  \input{\VAR{page.url_without_suffix}}
%% endfor
%% for folder in course.folders
  \graphicspath{{\VAR{folder.path}/}}
  \chapter{\VAR{folder.title}}
  %% for page in folder.subitems
    \input{\VAR{page.url_without_suffix}}
  %% endfor
%% endfor
\end{document}
